miniapp.name: QuickQR
miniapp.subtitle: Turn any text into a QR in a tap.
miniapp.description: QuickQR is a tiny mini app that instantly converts any text or URL into a clean QR code, perfect for sharing links, WiFi, or notes inside Base and Farcaster.
miniapp.ogDescription: Generate and share QR codes in seconds with QuickQR, a beautiful one-screen mini app for Base and Farcaster.
